version_description:
+ fixed input in local notification tests
+ fixed app store review link

+ added support for opening URLs directly from actions
+ added "Keep Notification" option to actions
+ extended JSON interface to support fully dynamic actions, inputs, and URLs

+ search in shortcut list
+ keyboard commands for iPad
+ fixed an issue where importing very large shortcut libraries failed (500+)
+ minor improvements in action editor
+ added configurable notification sounds

New Feature: Local Notification Triggers
+ on-device (local triggers work offline)
+ define schedules (daily, weekly, monthly)
+ define location triggers (arriving or leaving a region)

+ fixed UI glitches around search bar
+ fixed a problem where the Save button had to be tapped twice

+ advanced local triggers combining time and location
+ support for iBeacons

+ minor improvements
+ compatible with iOS 12.0

+ synchronization across all devices now default and free
+ added support for online actions and integration of online services
+ minor improvements

+ glitch-free launch screen
+ improved shortcuts import in certain cases
+ improved performance for server operations (like authorizing integrations or executing online actions)

+ add API key-based integrations
+ enabled API key access for api.pushcut.io/v1
+ fixed an issue where service integration error messages were not displayed correctly
+ improved user experience of first sign-in

+ introducing a free trial for the Pro plan
+ improved onboarding
+ improved subscription handling

New: Shortcuts support (iOS 13)
+ Schedule Pushcut notifications from shortcuts
+ Schedule a shortcut from shortcuts

Also:
+ support for Dark Mode
+ visual adjustments for iOS 13
+ fixed an issue where a notification without default action closes immediately

Improved shortcuts actions
+ fixed an issue where the input parameter was not passed to scheduled shortcuts when executed by tapping the notification
+ faster implementation (purely local cache-based with background refresh in app)
+ proper error messages if notifications or locations are no longer valid

HomeKit support
+ activate HomeKit scenes directly from notification actions
+ run multiple actions from one notification with "Keep Notification"
+ Pro Tip: use "Get contents of URL" in HomeKit automations to trigger notifications

Also:
+ fixed an issue where URL actions did not open from expanded notifications in iOS 13 when the URL was a universal link
+ scheduling shortcuts locally is now free and does not require a subscription
+ improved What's New and Welcome screens
+ input parameters can now be used in the URL field

Apple Watch
+ interactive UI for Pushcut notifications (requires watchOS 6)
+ run HomeKit scenes, online actions, or HTTP requests (like IFTTT webhooks) directly from your wrist
+ execute multiple actions from one notification (with "Keep Open" flag)
(Note: Opening Shortcuts, Safari, or other apps is not supported on Apple Watch)

URL Background Actions
+ execute web requests directly without running a shortcut or opening Safari
+ rich editor for various types of HTTP requests (GET, POST, PUT with json, form, or plain text content)
+ use input parameters inside request body and URL
+ perfect for home servers and IFTTT maker webhooks

Other
+ integration for Microsoft Flow released
+ improved onboarding
+ added feature to add HomeKit accessories
+ latest "What's New" page in About view

+ fixed an issue where HomeKit scenes with only AirPlay accessories were not listed
+ added a search bar to HomeKit scenes list
+ added account level validation to watch app
+ added Lifetime purchase option

Background Actions
+ use geofences and iBeacons as triggers, with optional time constraints
+ execute online actions and web requests in the background (eg: trigger IFTTT from an iBeacon)
+ no user interaction required

Improved Local Triggers
+ disable a local trigger without deleting it
+ define "do not repeat" durations for location triggers
+ add delays to location-based notifications (eg: 30 min after arriving at the office)
+ better navigation for editing local notification triggers

Other
+ renamed 'Run Shortcut' action to 'Schedule Shortcut'
+ added help links to API key view
+ fixed an issue that caused crashes on iOS 12 in screens displaying URLs

+ more forgiving validation of iBeacon UUID input
+ added a configurable grace period for disconnected iBeacons
(if you experience unwanted exiting/re-entering with your beacon, try increasing the "Ignore signal loss" duration in Settings)

+ improved loading speed of the expanded notification UI
+ fixed an issue where executing online actions in expanded notifications resulted in a "Not Authenticated" error in rare cases

Automation Server (Experimental)
+ execute shortcuts or HomeKit scenes through a webhook as server actions (intended to run on a dedicated iOS device)
+ go to Settings to get early access to this feature

Other
+ minor improvements in Shortcuts actions and UI

+ fixes and improvements around local trigger notification scheduling
+ improved stability of iBeacon background actions
+ added "screen saver" to Automation Server

+ added HTTP header editor for web request actions (eg: for API keys)
+ added links to Reddit and Automators Forum in About view

+ fixed an issue that caused high CPU usage after stopping the Automation Server (ie: device would get warm)
+ fixed an issue that caused the Automation Server to stop when internet connectivity was lost for a longer time

+ full integration of the Automation Server feature
+ added "Server" as action type (combining 3rd-party integrations and Automation Server requests)
+ directly execute server actions from background triggers and notifications (including Apple Watch)
+ minor improvements

Automation Server Extended
+ scheduled server actions (time of day, or every X minutes)
+ delayed server action execution (see web API)
+ extended daily limits

+ minor fixes and improvements
+ improved subscription handling

New Actions for Shortcuts
+ 'Send Notification' for sending Pushcut notifications your other devices
+ 'Execute Server Action' for executing and scheduling server actions (Automation Server)
+ 'Cancel Server Action' for cancelling a previously scheduled action

+ minor UI improvements here and there
+ fixed an issue with authorizing integrations through universal links

Custom Notification Sounds and Images
+ import your own notification sounds
+ attach images to notifications (supports both static files and dynamic URLs)

+ Custom images and sounds: minor improvements
+ improved notification and HomeKit permission handling

Improved Images and Sounds
+ fixed an issue where local notifications would not show the image in certain cases
+ fixed an issue where remote images from local URLs would not load

Removed "Basic" option from IAPs
+ the "Basic" plan will be discontinued

+ improved images and sounds
+ fixed an issue that caused crashes on iOS 12
